title: How to use English tenses correctly - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a very difficult topic to discuss on a one page paper. English, as a subject is very broad with a lot of major ,minor ,sub -major, and sub- minor topics. If a child is not taught on how to speak good English from infantry,then this continues. You can only know when to use English tenses correctly based on time,who,where,etc only if proper teaching of English language as a subject has been established.This is a very broad topic that is open for further suggestions or discussion.
